educations.school: Pune Institute of Computer Technology, University of Pune
educations.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
content: Courses: Data Structures, OOP, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Artificial Intelligence

experiences.position: Advanced Analytics and Data Engineering Intern
description: Developed an ETL tool to automate KPI metric calculations, reducing manual effort by 80% and saving approximately 15 hours per month.
Extracted data from Azure DevOps Boards, transformed it, and loaded it into Redshift by building a Python script, resulting in a 25% faster data retrieval process.
Collaborated with stakeholders to visualize data on Tableau dashboards, which improved report generation efficiency by 30% and increased data accuracy for business analytics.
Spearheaded the UX design for RxMind App by transforming ideas into detailed wireframes in Figma, shaping a user-focused visual style and layout.
Transformed wireframes into interactive UI components using Next.js, improving interface responsiveness and enhancing user engagement.
Elevated app security by implementing AWS Amplify for user authentication, leading to greater user confidence and data protection.
Enhanced a hotdesking application by implementing computer vision and OCR techniques to recognize labels in floor layout plans for Persistent offices.
Trained a custom model to accurately identify and mark seat locations within office floor layouts, achieving an 85% accuracy rate.

Contributed to the development of the Peoples' Biodiversity Registers Application for the Maharashtra State Biodiversity Board, focusing on bio-resource documentation, landscape data, and community demographics.
Digitized biodiversity reporting processes for over 10 villages, removing paperwork and reducing processing time by 70%.
Integrated geotagging capabilities to improve image capture accuracy, increasing data precision by 80%.
